section.title: About tiny-xml-doc-tools v0.1.0
section.p: The tiny-xml-doc-tools are a set of XSLT and script files used by the fizmo modules to provide documentation in various output formats. It invokes xsltproc to perform the actual conversion.

section.p: The following elements can be used for changelogs:

ul.li: <datetime> with @day-of-week, @month, @day, @hour, @minute, @second, @timezone and @year — denotes parent's change date.
<logentry> — Describes change, used inside change element.
